title: Dune: Part 3
description: Dune: Part 3, also known as Dune: Messiah, will explore the consequences of Paul Atreides' rise to power. The film will be based on Frank Herbert's novel of the same name.

title: Avatar 3
description: Avatar 3, also known as Fire and Ash, will focus on Jake Sully and Neytiri facing off against a new Na'vi tribe called the Ash People, a fiery and potentially antagonistic clan, while also dealing with the continued threat of the RDA and their attempts to further colonize Pandora, potentially utilizing a dangerous biological weapon to manipulate Pandora's ecosystem.
